com.xebialabs.overthere.spi
Class BaseOverthereFile<C extends OverthereConnection>

java.lang.Object
  com.xebialabs.overthere.spi.BaseOverthereFile<C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
OverthereFile
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteArrayFile, LocalFile
public abstract class BaseOverthereFile<C extends OverthereConnection>
extends java.lang.Object
implements OverthereFile

A file system object (file, directory, etc.) on a remote system that is accessible through an OverthereConnection.

getConnection

public C getConnection()
Description copied from interface: OverthereFile
Return the connection through which this file is accessible. If the connection is closed, this file may no longer be accessible.

Specified by:
getConnection in interface OverthereFile
Returns:
the connection through which this file is accessible.

getFile

public OverthereFile getFile(java.lang.String child)
Description copied from interface: OverthereFile
Returns a reference to a named child of this file or null if this file is not a directory. The child file returned may or may not exist.

Specified by:
getFile in interface OverthereFile
Parameters:
child - the name of the child relative to this file. May not contain path separators.
Returns:
the child of this file or null if this file is not a directory.

deleteRecursively

public void deleteRecursively()
                       throws RuntimeIOException
Description copied from interface: OverthereFile
Deletes this file or directory. If this file is a directory, its contents are deleted first.

Specified by:

copyTo

public final void copyTo(OverthereFile dest)
Description copied from interface: OverthereFile
Copies this file or directory (recursively) to the destination. Contrary to the semantics of OverthereFile.renameTo(OverthereFile), a file can be copied accross connections and across file systems withtin a connection.

Specified by:
copyTo in interface OverthereFile
Parameters:
dest - the file to copy to.
